This is the old version of the menbayes package. You should not use it. Please use the new version instead: <https://github.com/dcgerard/menbayes>

Provides a suite of methods for Bayesian tests for Mendelian segregation in experimental polyploid populations (for now, just tetraploids). This is under different assumptions of meiosis.

## Installation

You can install the development version of menbayesAlpha from [GitHub](https://github.com/gerardlab/menbayesAlpha) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("gerardlab/menbayesAlpha")
```
